description: Handy wand, helper to buy bytes with ostable interest

field_descriptions.interest: Accrue interest from deposits. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Withdraw funds/withdraw interest. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.asset: Asset ID to withdraw (44 characters or base if not set).
field_descriptions.add_dep: Add ostable deposit. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.rm_dep: Remove ostable deposit. Set the value to 1.
